toolingEntityParticle.Label: Actual Firm Date

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: This is the Item Type of the PO Requisition. It may be either 'Purchased' or 'Subcontract'. Subcontract indicates that one or more components will be supplied to the vendor from your inventory. This defauls from the Purchase Item Master value.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Req Item Type
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__icreq_itemtype_pl__c

(DD)</description> <escapeMarkup>false</escapeMarkup> <externalId>false</externalId> <inlineHelpText>This is the Item Type of the PO Requisition. It may be either 'Purchased' or 'Subcontract'. toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: Requisition Number (Order #). MRP generated reqs are auto-numbered. Manual req #s require a leading alpha-character if 'Auto Number Non-MRP Inventory Reqs' on the Div Master Auto Numbering Tab isn't enabled. If enabled, the req # will be auto-numbered.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Requisition No
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__icreq_ordno__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: Requisition Status
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Req Status
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__icreq_ordsts__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: This is the status of the PO Requisition. MRP created Planned Requisitions which must be Firmed and Approved to convert to a PO. Manual reqs are created at Firm, Not Approved status and must then be Approved.

toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__icreq_ordsts_pl__c

The value in the field is sourced from the commodity code to which this item is associated. toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: This is the date the requisition must be firmed by the buyer or planner in order to be available when required. The calculation takes into consideration both vendor lead time and inspection lead time.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Sched Firm Date
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__icreq_schedfirmdte__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: This is the date the vendor is scheduled to ship the material to the facility to satisfy the dock date.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Sched Vendor Ship Date
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__icreq_shipdte__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: This is the site for the Purchase Order Requisition.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Site
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__icreq_site__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: This is set to current date when the PO Requisition is added, and adjusted to the current date when the status changes. This field is disabled for user input.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Req Status Date
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__icreq_stsdte__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: This field carries a record of the price that was returned by the PO Line Price algorithm (which may or may not have been used on the Purchase Order Line). This value is passed from the Requisition to the PO Line upon conversion.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: System Calculated Price
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__icreq_sysprice__c
